Description:
We call them our signature for a reason. Our signature khakis are the pants you know us for, with iron free technology, added stretch and a flex comfort waistband™ so you look and feel good at all times. We made this pair with our new stain defender — a more sustainable, pfc-free way to protect from stains — and finished it off with our suite of water<less® techniques. 
The best-in-class khaki we're known for this fit is straight and relaxed — but never baggy. 
our big & tall sizes feature extended waists, deeper front pockets, back pockets up to half an inch wider for sizes 46 and up, longer inseams for tall sizes and a knee that's positioned correctly.

Title: Hanes Sport X-Temp Air Mesh Mens 4 Pack Long Leg Boxer Briefs
Description:
For your next workout - or days that just feel like one long workout - try Hanes® Sport® X-Temp ultra-light mesh boxer briefs for light, lightweight comfort. Made of airy stretch mesh, they're made with X-Temp™ technology - designed to adapt to your temperature for all-day comfort. Sleek and sexy with a longer leg, this performance underwear is made with four-way stretch fabric that moves effortlessly with you. Even better, boxer briefs use Hanes® FreshIQ™ advanced odor protection technology that fights odor-causing bacteria for all-day freshness. They even have a smooth, moisture-wicking logo waistband for even more comfort at your middle. You'll also appreciate the no-ride-up leg bands and the tagless, itch-less styling. These airy mesh performance boxer briefs are available in a convenient 4-pack of assorted solid colors, making it easy to stock up.
# Pieces In Set: 4-Pack
Features: Breathable, Moisture Wicking, Multi-Pack, Tag Free, Stretch Fabric, Odor Resistant, Fly Front, Regulate Temperature, Cooling, Comfort Waistband, Antimicrobial, Long Leg

Deemed a Gotta-Have-It item for value you can count on every day! Thanks to its relaxed-fit and soft feel, this men's crew-neck t-shirt by Stafford is both a downtime and a sleep essential. The smooth, breathable stretch-cotton fabric will make a cozy cover-up with some lounge shorts on mornings in with the paper and a good breakfast.

Title: IZOD Advantage Performance Mens Classic Fit Short Sleeve Polo Shirt
Description: Versatile and stylish, the IZOD Advantage Performance polo combines comfort, quality, and fit. This own-it-in-every-color men’s polo is designed for everyday wear with a classic 2-button placket, subtly darker trim, and a roll-resistant collar. Featuring a regular cut, our short-sleeve polo shirt for men is crafted from a naturally stretchy and cooling fabric with UV-15 sun protection that pulls moisture from the skin and dries quickly for added comfort. Our polo is made from a breathable blend of 60% cotton and 40% polyester with Sport Flex technology that allows the lightweight fabric to move with you for maximum flexibility. Available in an assortment of multiple colors and sizes, this men’s shirt is machine washable for easy care. An iconic wardrobe staple, this classic shirt can be styled with anything in your closet to always create the right look. IZOD is an iconic clothing brand that designs men’s apparel with a focus on comfort, quality and fit. Our pants, shirts, activewear, and more are wardrobe essentials that are designed to be classics, season after season.

Title: Stafford Coolmax Mens Big and Tall Classic Fit Suit Pants
Description:
Constructed with Stafford's Coolmax technology, this pair of men's big and tall suit pants will keep you cool and comfortable throughout the seasons. This timeless tailored straight-leg pant is made from a stretch wool-blend in a classic-fit and features a hook-and-eye with zip closure, an adjustable waist, and side and back pockets. Wear them with the matching suit jacket for a complete look.
Front Style: Flat Front
Features: Fly Front, Adjustable Waist
Closure Type: Button, Zipper
Fit: Classic Fit
Pockets: 2 Back Button Pockets, 2 Side Slip Pockets
Rise: At Waist
Fiber Content: 51% Wool, 47% Polyester, 2% Spandex
Fabric Description: Woven
Lining: Lined

Title: Levi's® Men's 527™ Slim Fit Bootcut Jean - Stretch
Description:
Our designers challenged themselves to get the same looks we all love, but using less water in the finishing stage. That’s why Levi’s developed more than 20 innovative techniques that do just that: use less of our world’s precious natural resource. Through 2019, 69% of Levi’s bottoms were made waterless.
Offered in Big & Tall in select finishes 
Levis Style: 527
Features: Fly Front, Stretch Fabric
Closure Type: Button & Zipper
